column2: so good. Everyone talks about the brunch
column3: so my boyfriend and I decided to try the dinner. He got the shrimp and pork belly
column4: I got the goat patty melt
column5: and we also got goat cheese fries and the crab dip. It was all incredible. The cocktails were great and super fresh too. And of course we had to finish with the pork and toffee shake. I thought it sounded too weird for me
column6: but really just has more of a smoked flavor with tons of toffee goodness. The hosts
column8: and waiters/waitresses were all super friendly and gave us lots of great suggestions too!
